features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Our intelligent technology ensures fast and accurate text extraction from images.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Receive extracted text in seconds, streamlining your workflow.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No technical expertise needed—simply upload your image and let our AI handle the rest.

items.title: Data Privacy Assured
items.description: All image processing occurs locally, ensuring your data remains private and secure.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to convert images to text

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Upload a clear image containing text, whether printed or handwritten. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Text Extraction
items.description: Our advanced AI analyzes the image and extracts the text while maintaining high accuracy.

items.title: Review & Copy
items.description: Preview the extracted text, make any necessary edits, and copy it for your needs.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless users who have simplified their text extraction with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: I love how quickly I can extract quotes and text from my notes. It's a huge time-saver!

items.name: John Smith
items.comment: As a researcher, being able to convert images of documents into editable text has been invaluable.

items.name: Linda Park
items.comment: The accuracy of the text extraction is impressive. I've used it for both printed and handwritten materials!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common queries about the image to text feature

items.title: What types of text can be extracted?
items.description: Our technology can extract both printed and handwritten text from images, including documents, signs, and notes, ensuring high accuracy and readability.

items.title: Is there a limit on the number of images I can convert?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 30 free credits daily, allowing ample conversions. You can earn more credits through activities like surveys or challenges on our Discord.

items.title: Can I use the extracted text for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes! Paid users can utilize extracted text for commercial projects. Free-tier users are limited to personal use.

items.title: How is my privacy maintained during the extraction process?
items.description: WaveSpeed ensures your photos are processed locally in your browser, meaning your images and data never leave your device.

footer.heading: Ready to Convert Your Images to Text?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience seamless text extraction. No sign-up required.
